MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.40pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:46pm on 3rd November 2020.
